Previous.Title: Previous
Next.Title: Next
ScaleP.Title: Zoom In
ScaleM.Title: Zoom Out
AnnotationCommands2D.Title: Annotation Commands
AnnotationCommands2D.ShortHelp: Displays a context toolbar that provides access to annotation commands.
AnnotationCommands2D.LongHelp: This context toolbar is located to the right of the work area.
AnnotationCommands2DText.Title: Text Annotation
AnnotationCommands2DText.ShortHelp: Displays a context toolbar that provides access to text annotation.
AnnotationCommands2DText.LongHelp: This context toolbar is located to the right of the work area.
Zoom.Title: Zoom In or Out
Zoom.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Zoom In or Out</uicontrol>, then drag up to zoom in, and drag down to zoom out.
Pan.Title: Pan
Pan.ShortHelp: Moves the model view horizontally and vertically.
Pan.LongHelp: Click <uicontrol>Pan</uicontrol>, then drag in any direction.
Reframe.Title: Fit All In
Reframe.ShortHelp: Fits the entire model in the 3D area.
FitWidth.Title: Fit Width
FitWidth.ShortHelp: Fits the width of the page to that of the frame.
DownloadDocument.Title: Download PDF
DownloadPDF.Title: Download Document
DownloadPDF.ShortHelp: Downloads the document on your device.
ToggleView.Title: Hide/Show Navigation Tools
ToggleView.ShortHelp: Displays page thumbnails, comments, bookmarks, and attachments.
ToggleView.LongHelp: To navigate between these, click the corresponding icon at the top of the navigation panel. Then, to jump to a specific page, comment, or bookmark, or to open an attachment in a new tab, click the corresponding item.
TextSelection.Title: Text Selection
Search.Title: Search
Search.ShortHelp: Displays a search bar at the top, allowing to search for text in the current document.
ClockWise.Title: Rotate Clockwise
AntiClockWise.Title: Rotate Counterclockwise
HighlightText.Title: Highlight the text
HighlightText.ShortHelp: Command is used to highlight the selected text.
SinglePageView.Title: Page by Page Scrolling
SinglePageView.ShortHelp: Displays a single page view of the PDF, letting you scroll page by page.
ScrollingView.Title: Continuous Scrolling
ScrollingView.ShortHelp: Lets you scroll the PDF continuously rather than page by page.
PresentationView.Title: Presentation View
PresentationView.ShortHelp: Opens the PDF in presentation mode
AnnotationTour2D.Title: Annotation Tour
AnnotationTour2D.ShortHelp: Switches from one annotation viewpoint to another.
AnnotationTour2D.LongHelp: To go though the annotation series, click the arrows to the left or to the right of the work area.
